Our location

Being based in central Sevenoaks, JE Bennett Law is particularly well placed to serve clients in Kent, London and the Home Counties, although we have clients across the country. With excellent access to local rail and road networks, we are more than happy to meet our clients in the comfort of their own home/care location.

Get in touch

If you'd like to find out how JE Bennett Law can help you, please get in touch. We understand how daunting it can be in often difficult circumstances and we pride ourselves on our understanding and friendly approach.

We offer a free phone consultation service with no obligation.
